Title: Establishes Davina's driver accountability law which requires a uniform curriculum for accident prevention courses; repealer
Summary: Establishes Davina's driver accountability law which requires the commissioner of motor vehicles to establish a uniform curriculum for accident prevention courses for use by all sponsoring agencies, delivery agencies and instructors in this state; provides for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, the education law and the insurance law, in relation to requiring a uniform curriculum for accident prevention courses; to repeal certain provisions of the vehicle and traffic law relating thereto; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions of the vehicle and traffic law upon expiration thereof
